headers.value: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' plausible.io static.cloudflareinsights.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' fonts.googleapis.com; img-src 'self' data: blob:; font-src 'self' fonts.gstatic.com; connect-src 'self' plausible.io cloudflareinsights.com *.cloudflareinsights.com; frame-ancestors 'none'; base-uri 'self'; form-action 'self'
